error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_install_schema(). Deprecated in drupal:9.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. No direct replacement is provided.

Parameter $event of method Drupal\simple_amp\EventSubscriber\AmpResponseSubscriber::onAmpRoute() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForControllerResultEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ViewEvent instead

Parameter $event of method Drupal\simple_amp\EventSubscriber\AmpResponseSubscriber::onRespond() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\FilterResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ResponseEvent instead

Call to deprecated method getImplementations() of class Drupal\Core\Extension\ModuleHandlerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Instead you should use ModuleHandlerInterface::invokeAllWith() for hook invocations or you should use ModuleHandlerInterface::hasImplementations() to determine if hooks implementations exist.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
